body:
- Registering package: SciMLSensitivity
- Repository: https://github.com/SciML/SciMLSensitivity.jl
- Created by: @ChrisRackauckas
- Version: v7.0.0
- Commit: 92938e3f7e98a24b0c0c9a4839bcce7637a5d3c9
- Reviewed by: @ChrisRackauckas
- Reference: https://github.com/SciML/SciMLSensitivity.jl/issues/107#issuecomment-1166266572
- Description: A component of the DiffEq ecosystem for enabling sensitivity analysis for scientific machine learning (SciML). Optimize-then-discretize, discretize-then-optimize, and more for ODEs, SDEs, DDEs, DAEs, etc.
<!--  -->
title: New package: SciMLSensitivity v7.0.0
